body.p: I have just mailed a letter to Judge Williams enclosed on the back -- "W Judge Williams is not "in Louisville the P. M. will please hand this to Thos S. Pope or Govr Robinson." Will you ascertain if Judge Williams is there & if not call for the letter & deliver it in person to Govr Robinson & endorse me as strong as you can as his favorable attention to it will save me more money than I can now pay besides there are some matters of public interest in it requiring his official attention -- Now dont neglect to attend to this in person -- Jno Q A King will pay that fee bill in a few days
